name: Alan Witkowski
story: Alan grew up in a small village in the Polish countryside, where he developed a love for hunting and outdoor activities. After completing his mandatory military service, he decided to join the Polish Army to further serve his country. He is proud of his heritage and is a devout Catholic, drawing strength and comfort from his faith. Alan is happily married to his high school sweetheart, Marta. They have one daughter named Maria and are expecting their second child soon. Alan is a natural leader and is well respected by his fellow soldiers.
